website_summaries.verdict: This electric pump may not have as much suction as other brands, but it provides flexibility. It's highly portable and can run on AA batteries if necessary.
pros: Three pumping styles and eight suction levels to imitate baby's feeding pattern for maximum milk production
Use as a single or double pump
Can pump directly into milk bags
Easy to fit in diaper bag
Plug in or use six "AA" batteries

website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch double breast pump makes it easy for moms to maximize their milk production.
pros: Offers 3 pumping styles and 8 suction levels to help a mom match a baby's feeding pattern
Includes a hygienic, closed system that limits the risk of mold and bacteria build-up
Designed to fit perfectly inside a diaper bag
Boasts an LCD back-lit display that makes the pump a great option for nighttime pumping
cons: Provides limited suction in contrast to similar double breast pumps

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Even at peak fullness and with an ample milk supply, this pump pumped nothing. Attempted multiple times and used multiple sizes of flanges. The problem seems to be with the pump itself, not necessarily the flanges. With other pumps 5-6 ounces after 5-6 minutes is average for me.This one struggled to produce three ounces total. Hugely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: This pump is amazing! I went from a manual Medela pump to ...
customer_reviews.text: This pump is amazing! I went from a manual Medela pump to this Lansinoh double electric and I absolutely love it. The only bad thing about this is that the battery life does not last long at all. I got my pump in on a Monday and the batteries died on Wednesday. Also, The power button on the pump doesn’t always turn on and off easily. I have to continuously keep pressing it down in order for it to turn on/off. Other than that, everything about this pump is great
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perez

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I write something after using for a while to be honest in my reviews. So in past 6 monthes it is working perfectly. Using every twice per day. Just fyi It was my first pump. I am totaly new in breastfeeding. So it didnt heart me at all. Very smooth and quite. No pain or discomfort. U just need also a special bra to make your hands free. Usually I just sit watching my tv show while this machine does its job. Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Milana Pary

customer_reviews.title: Good pump
customer_reviews.text: I like this pump a lot. I didn’t give 5 stars bc it’s the BEST pump, but bc of the price with its functionality. It has battery option for portability or adaptar for wall. It’s pretty quiet & is compact ( like the size of your hand). The flanges included are soft around the side so there’s less cutting into your boobs. ***The picture is to compare size with my spectra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery feature not strong, otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've used it steadily for a month or so now, so I think I'm ready to write a review. I'm gonna give it 4 stars because it doesn't run very strong when it's being battery operated. Kind of noisy. Otherwise, it's a great purchase. I don't have a lot of "pump experience" to compare it to, but it does its job and does it well. Also fits the madela flanges, so that's a bonus. It comes with a carry bag with some extra room too. This pump is a winner, and deserves a chicken dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Deans

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product and no customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this breast pump in November even though I wasn't due until March. We were excited to receive this item, however once I actually was able to use this in March, I am no longer able to return this item even though it wasn't used. The breast pump is causing batteries to nearly explode, the wall plug doesn't work since the internal unit part has moved. I tried contacting Lansinoh customer service, I had to leave a message since no one answered. Also I emailed them, with no response. I would not recommend buying this item unless you are within a few days of using it since we got a lemon!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kahl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing but functional
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my pump exclusively for about 2 weeks now and already it is losing suction and sucking air in one of the valves. I can hear it sucking air. I also need smaller openings on the breast shields for my small nipples and haven't been able to find any for purchase. The openings suck in most of my areola as well as nipple and it can he quite painful to use. Between this and the loss of suction I am very disappointed, considering all the good reviews and being a well reputed brand. I am able to pump between 1-3 oz per session, which is about average for breast pumps.
customer_reviews.author: Humblebee

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my Spectra, but it's good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I get way more milk with my Spectra pumps, but this one is so nice and compact, it's much better for traveling with. I used it 4 times for 20 minutes each time for the first time (10 minutes on each breast individually because it didn't seem strong enough to double pump with) and it nearly used ALL of the brand new Duracell batteries, so be aware in case you plan on using it exclusively with batteries for an extended period of time!
customer_reviews.author: LizzieR

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was used and repackaged...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a breast pump and decided to go with lansinoh because my sister had one and liked it. When I got the package at the house and opened it the pump was collapsed in the box and the plastic in the front was loose there was something all over the pump and it looked used. The tubing was bent in half leaving a kink that won't come out all together I'm disappointed that it was shipped like this and I am expected to package this back up return it and hope for better next time.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Martin

customer_reviews.title: My pump stopped working in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This pump lasted me less than 3 months. It shuts off when I plug it in or when I use batteries. Maybe this will work for someone who does not have to use it every day. It is best to invest a little more money in a better pump that will last longer with frequent use
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Love this pump!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this breast pump system. I have a Medela pump also. I've used the Medela pump with 2 other kids and it worked well. This time around I chose to purchase this pump as well. Based on the reviews and the fact that I can use batteries was a plus. Since I've started using the Signature Pro, I've had more milk output, it's a bit quieter than the Medela and I really like the time feature. I would definitely recommend this breast pump. A contributing factor that has allowed me to pump more milk is the features that allows you to adjust the speed and strength. GREAT PUMP!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Cee

customer_reviews.title: This brand makes a good pump, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pump, the suction power will not hold the cups to your breast (I don’t know of any pump that will) but the varying speeds and suction options are excellent to get the flow going and maintain comfort. I will only be using this part time and breast feeding as my main method so not being hands free doesn’t make a huge deal to me but for a mom planning to use this frequently I highly recommend the pump bra that will hold the bottles in place. There are few parts involved in this and they come apart easily to clean. I do think a better storage situation would be nice but the bag works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Russell

customer_reviews.title: Aewsome
customer_reviews.text: i made the mistake in boiling my Lansinoh parts and forgot about them in a non stick pan which of course destroyed the parts i bought a whole new pump because there were no near by stores in my area that carried just the extra Lansinoh pump parts but i love my pump, with all of the different types of suctions and suction rhythms to adjust specificly for you, which is awesome.!!!! The parts are great and work cohesively with the main part of the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Taliah

customer_reviews.title: Just no.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. As a mother who breast fed one child for 2 years then had another to breast feed I purchased this when my other kicked the bucket. You expect a pump to actually you know pump... nothing at all the suction was so poor it barely produced a drop. The device was shotty and almost seemed to misfire. Spend the extra money and get a Medela pump if you’re serious about pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ressler

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned at the third month of use
customer_reviews.text: I am three months post partum and started using the pump about a week after I had my baby as I speak the pump is malfunctioning. I pump at least twice a day and by the second or third pump session, it stops functioning half way. I am really sad and would need to get a new pump.
customer_reviews.author: Uwa

customer_reviews.title: terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: the product was fine, returned because no longer needed i selected to have amount credited to amazon balance had to call TWICE after the pkg was returned to have them actually process the refund then the person that processed it sent the money back to my bank account and not to my balance which is what i needed so i could apply that to a different purchase that i need asap now i have to wait a week to get those funds back when they had no problem withdrawing them asap smh this is the type of stuff that has led to me using amazon less and less
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time mom
customer_reviews.text: So i am a first time mom and i was using a hand pump.. but sometimes its so tired to pump 15 min each. So i went online for an electronic pump.. i decide to go wit the Lansinoh Pump, and to be honest, this pump is really good, the only this is that the pump is a little bit to loud when pumping. Otherwise i like the pump and can take it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nari

customer_reviews.title: To many issues do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about 6 months while at work before it would no longer support batteries and I had to buy a separate plug for my car and then used it total 7 or 8 months before it stopped working as a double :( I would have to use it as a single pump which was not ideal when at work. Bottles and nipples are cute tho I would not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and productive
customer_reviews.text: I settled on this breast pump since I did not have luck with Medela. I found this one to be comfortable, productive, and convenient (due to its portable size). Cleaning was easy as was assembly. I found it to be not terribly loud nor super quiet. I put a blanket over the machine to quiet it slightly but even without the blanket it’s not overwhelmingly loud.
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: Better than hospital grade pumps.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy we made the decision to buy this pump. It works better than the one we used in the hospital. I only wish it was easier to clean, it's says in instructions u have to boil for 5 mins after every use. But I am sure hot soapy water can do the work too but I follow the instructions. Great buy. Easy to assemble n disassemble. Pumps wonderfully. Love the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lisana khan

customer_reviews.title: Nice pump
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pump for a month at my full time job, 3 times a day. It has definitely done the job and well. I liked the flanges because they have a rubber rim instead of inserts like some pumps have, but I have since replaced the flanges with silicone ones, through no fault of the ones included. The pump came with a carrying bag and extra duckbill valves, samples of bra pads and storage bags. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Penton

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. This pump has little to no suction power, if you use this you are not pumping to your full potential. I switched to a spectra S2 and it's amazing what your output can be when you have actual suction. The flanges are not big boob friendly. The inner angle is too acute to comfortably fit the breast so that the nipple is able to move freely in the flange tunnel.. ALSO, there are no generic lansinoh parts you can buy to have extra on hand, so you have to pay full price the name brand flanges.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and convenient Pump
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the Spectra 2 but since I was going on a 10 day vacation I wanted something portable. This machine was amazing and perfect for privately/conveniently pumping on the planes. It's so tiny I was able to pump right in my seat. This machine is louder than the spectra 2 but still relatively quiet. The suction level is perfect and allows you to adjust it. It only lights up when you press a button. Overall I was very pleased and would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little pump
customer_reviews.text: I love this pump. I have had two Lansinoh pumps so far, and bought this one after my Spectra lost suction and my supply dipped (and my supply never really went back to where it had been). I'll be buying another one of these soon as a backup for the one I bought to replace the Spectra. I like that this pump is small, lightweight, and quiet. It's an effective pump. Don't know why I ever changed up and went with another brand after it worked so well with my first baby.
customer_reviews.author: Shows

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: This breast pump is great. I used it to induce labor 15 min on 15 min off. I've used it to pump lightly because she was having issues latching and tore my nipples up. The pump hurts less than she does and I don't have to worry about her starving while I give my nipples a minute ofa break. I like that you can adjust the suction and it's very straight forward and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice product but for what???
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product but what are these for? They obviously put a lot of thought into the design and ergonomics to make them very comfortable to use. They are also very quiet and have a very strong suction on them. My one complaint is that the suction was so strong that it hurt the hair on my chest. I mean the price was great, I just don’t know why any man would want these things. Weirdest birthday gift ever.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Annazone

customer_reviews.title: Versus the symphony
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump before I had my son with intent to not use it much at all. When he didn’t latch, I had no choice but to pump exclusively and rented the medela symphony from the hospital to boost supply the first 2 weeks. My two weeks is almost up and I decided to get my own pump out Incase j needed to extend my rental and I am so impressed! This pump is giving me the same if not better results than what I was getting out of an almost 2000$ retail pump. So glad I purchased this instead of going for the more expensive options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Medela is better
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pump with all the additions because my medela broke after two years, after a month of using one of the top closing caps broke at the part where the tube connects and I couldn't use both anymore, on their website one cap part cost around 3 dollars but shipping was 11$ really? So I HAD to buy their extra set because it came with the cap I needed. Medela is good if you need suction power, this one might be a good alternative if you don't have the budget, but I think you should just pay for something better, I was cheap and got a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: Coronado

customer_reviews.title: 2 Weeks : (
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this “pumper” (what my 6 year old calls it) stopped working after 2 weeks. Was great while it lasted but didn’t last very long. Sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Rudee Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing letdown feature
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump as a second pump for traveling because my spectra s2 would take too much space in a suitcase. I ended up loving it more than my spectra and I use it as my every day pump now. It is a bit loud, but so much smaller than other electric pumps. The letdown feature is much different than the spectras, it’s similar to my baby’s suckling so I get good strong letdowns. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Worked quite well
customer_reviews.text: For anyone wanting to breastfeed, a good quality breast pump is a necessity. The first week is the hardest, as my wife only had a bare trickle the first couple of days. Things quickly got better, and made it so we could alternate feedings at night, so one of us got a decent amount of sleep. The batteries worked for 4-5 pumpings. Bring extras, just in case. Rarely pumped both breasts at once. It was good to have an extra setup, so we'd have a clean extra one. One valve developed a hole in it, but the extras still work fine. This unit being dual voltage is great if you're traveling.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pump, and quickly figured out what setting works best for me. I personally feel the Lansinoh manual pump has a stronger suction and doesn’t require much effort into squeezing the handle. I use this pump for the faster dual action and it’s nice to have a large range of settings and a timer to check the rate at which your milk is coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I have used Medela prior to purchasing this pump. The suction was just as good as the Medela pump. I loved the portability and ease of use. It’s bag is adorable too. The pieces are easy to clean and resemble. I loved the price of this set as well. Much better than any others I priced.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not a good portable option
customer_reviews.text: I am exclusively pumping and I bought this pump as an on the go pump! While I’m driving or out for too long. Over all the pump is great but the battery part is sad! The battery will die really quick on you after 2-3 pumping sessions! That means you keep restocking on 6 AA batteries! Not sure how budget friendly that is. I would not recommend buying this if you are looking for portability with this pump!
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: AMMAAZINGG!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pump! As a first time mom, this pump is very easy to put together, take down and clean, and use in general. I've been using it for about 2 months and I'm glad I got it instead of purchasing the more costly medela pump (Saved me about $120 bucks). If you're having any issues with suction, it's quite easy to troubleshoot. I highly recommend this product to all breastfeeding moms.
customer_reviews.author: Myeisha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good pump!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pump for the price. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it is a little noisier than the other pumps I have used which is not ideal for middle of the night pumping but I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Boardman

customer_reviews.title: It not a great pump
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why I got this pump, this very heavy and the pump makes big noise while suction. The suction power is super Bad. the only reason i got this is I have lansinoh bottles, so that they will all be one set! I am planning to return the product!
customer_reviews.author: Mithun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So glad it got this for my 2nd baby. Super light and portable. The bag that comes with it is great to throw everything in plus whatever else you need like bags, etc. My baby (who was in the NICU) actually preferred the nipple, that comes with it to create a bottle, over the hospital one. Its shaped more like a real breast. Overall, I would buy this again or gift it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica P Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Does the work
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit noise but nothing to worry. Wife had to carry it to the kitchen at midnight so she wouldn’t wake up our baby. It does the work for the price. Get the bottle holder because you’ll get tired of holding them. It’s a great pump for the price. And get some bags
customer_reviews.author: Jorge & Brenda

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase since health care denied me a new pump - my other child was born 2yrs ago, they told me to buy it outright they only cover every 36 months.i thought it would be chinzy but This works great . Its even stronger than the one they lent me in the hospital. There are extra valves and bottles come with it and covers. It easy to use . Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction power but otherwise ok
customer_reviews.text: This pump appears to be easy to use and highly functional but it is not. The auction power on this doesn’t reach the hind milk at the back of the breast no matter the setting. I like that it is small and easy to use and clean but it isn’t for me and my breastfeeding needs.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not the best design
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, but the design could be improved. When I am sitting down to pump It would be more convenient, comfortable, and functional if the tube part of the trumpet piece that attaches to the breast had an angle to it so that the milk would flow down. As it is it seems I’m always having to uncomforably position the bottles so the milk will flow into them.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The product does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some bad reviews i was changing my mind about this product but I’m glad I bought it. The longest ave pumped at a time is over 20 minutes and it worked perfect! I guess you have to buy it to to see dor yourselves I’m happy with it! I makes a lil noise but not enough to wake my baby up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this pump because I loved the manual pump that this brand makes. But I was extremely disappointed when I got the pump because I could not get any milk out the suction is so low. I guess I will have to spend the money and get the spectra.
customer_reviews.author: ernie arana

customer_reviews.title: Suction Level Sucks
customer_reviews.text: I'm not 100% satisfied with this pump.It don't suction very well.I sit fir 30 minutes pumping to get around 4 oz of milk because the suction levels are too low.Another thing is the power button is really hard.I have to press multiple times to turn it ON or Off, I'm guessing its defective.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price... BUT IT'S NOT SILENT...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My breastfeeding experience has split in two: pre-electric and post-electric. For the price, it's a very nice option. Works very well, and has all the options that you'd need. A few cons: 1. Noisy. I thought it'd be more silent after the description. 2. Your breasts are suctioned by the hard plastic  ̈cones ̈. My manual avent pump, has a soft silicon piece which you place in the cone, so your breast aren't vacumed against that hard plastic. 3. It would've been nice to have a carrying case. It's fairly small, and a carrying case to keep all the components together would've been a nice touch. Other than that, a very good purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AngelV

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have this breast pump and the medela pump in style. I have to say the 2 really work differently. I love the Lansinoh because it doesn't feel as full force as the medela. I work full time so I feel like having one for work and one for home works best for me and this is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. My old pump died and I had to buy this while Lansinoh replaces my old motor--- LITERALLY BEEN PUMPING FOR 20 MINUTES AND HAVE LESS THAN 2 OZ when I was getting 4 before. I wil NEVER EVER EVER use lansinoh again. I am at work panicking about feeding my child.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Since most of the negative reviews are from last year they've really up-ed their product. There's no fading of letters. No leaking at all. It's easy to put together and clean. My only bad is that I'm EXTREMELY sensitive and even on the lowest setting it's painful - on one breast. The other side is not so sensitive. It's all on the person. Batteries have lasted me more than 3 days. I use this several times a day. I've had this product for a week. I'd recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Had a slight issue
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a lot of different pieces so it was hard to take it anywhere and washing was a process but other than that it worked great! I did have an issue with my first one, after a few uses the suction stopped working but I contacted the company and they sent me a new one for no cost and so far I've had no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not hospital grade
customer_reviews.text: Milk slowly dwindled away in just a few weeks... suction and pattern were not good. Tried adjusting it to no avail. Forced to switch to formula :(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pumpers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve used three different pumps and this has all the features I want for a great price, so glad I’ll have it when I return to school I’m the fall!
customer_reviews.author: Len W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product that worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I used this pump for long time I am 100 % satisfied and happy for having tools like this. mothers know how much breast milk is important. I saved lots of milk in my refrigerator. IO loved the suction power.
customer_reviews.author: DEYAS eYERUSALEM

customer_reviews.title: Good pump only slightly issue
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pump. But I seem to already have one suction cup not being able to keep a good seal. The edges seem to curling a bit and only been in use for a few days. Does work other than the occasional miss suck. I'll probably just ordered replacement suctions if that's a thing. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Allgood

customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it died on me today without warning. I plugged it in and it didn’t turn on. Tried different outlets and it had just died. Had to leave work, engorged, to go get a new pump and bottles. This would be a great pump for the occasional pumper. I’ve been using it 3x a day 5 days a week since June.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kid

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Good pump. I bought it because it’s portable and runs on batteries. I’m disappointed in how long the batteries last and how many batteries you have to use. My 6 AA batteries lasted me about 2 days and then the suction looses its power. I used the battery method more than the plugged in method since I am currently pumping every 2 hours. Other than that it’s a good pump for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Okay.. Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean but feel like it looses suction over time. Couldn't use double at same time. Wasn't enough suction for me. Very easy to use and clean. I would nurse one one side and pump on other. Used it as a back up
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: Great investment and product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for more suction and power. I originally bought the freemie and love it due to the freedom to move around but wanted more power and the ability to pump in less time. This pump does it. I can pump what I need in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Neshaya Randall

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Very great pump! Isn’t loud at all, I can pump while my newborn is asleep and it doesn’t wake her up! I haven’t had any problems with it! Love that it’s a closed system! Easy to clean! Comes with great instructions! Would recommend to my friends! It has many settings so you can adjust to your needs!
customer_reviews.author: savanah hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great pump-as long as it's working
customer_reviews.text: I love the pump, it's pretty quiet, price is good, everything "fits" and all the extra parts are easy to find if you need. However, after less than 2 months it stopped working. The customer service I have received so far has been fantastic. They are sending me a new one. I'm just worried that this one will stop working too. So all in all, great pump, but seems like a gamble to me. After using a couple times a day for less than 2 months, seems like it should still be working.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pump!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this because my old pump gave out and I was not disappointed. It is so quiet and super light and easy to carry around! I love the let down mode. If you’re concidering getting this pump, it is very much worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pump!
customer_reviews.text: I used a hospital grade Medela pump before purchasing this one (Lansinoh double electric breast pump) and in my opinion its just as strong and just as fast. I also purchased the Philips Avent single electric pump and liked it but it's not as fast because it only does one side at a time but it does have its ups... its really portable and came with the option to use as a manual pump... its gentle too. I use the Lansinoh one the most because of the speed and powerful suction... I'm exclusively breast feeding my daughter, she has a hard time latching on so I use this pump at least 5 times a day and love it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr22

customer_reviews.title: Don’t read reviews and just buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I was very scared that it will hurt my nipples cuz they were sore from bad latching. But this pump is amazing, gentle and powerful. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Nice but painful, difficult to get right setting
customer_reviews.text: After using the hospital grade (god sent) to this pump huge difference. As portable and light this pump was it always left sores on me and was difficult to get just right. I avoided pumping due to suction sores. I loved the closed sytem similar to the hospital grade pump. easy to clean. unfortunately it discouraged me to pump due to getting sores.
customer_reviews.author: firecracker.07

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable pump
customer_reviews.text: This pump exceeds my expectations. It is easy to assemble, clean and use. You can plug it in or use batteries. Another plus is that you can control the suction in case it is uncomfortable and it comes with a bag to carry everywhere. I fully recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mayra

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to own multiple
customer_reviews.text: Even though there pump came with a bag to carry it with you... I couldn't manage to keep that system going. My life is simple, and I only need to pump at home and at work. So I set up a pumping station for myself in each location, getting rid of the pump insurance provided in order to use this one in both locations. The flanges provided didn't work for me, so I ordered an after market set that I've had no problem attaching.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Spearen

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Omg..I'm so happy I bought this. I needed a breastpump as my insurance would not give me one. I was getting low on my milk supply. Works great. This was recommended to me by a friend and now I'm recommending it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya

customer_reviews.title: Good pump, great value
customer_reviews.text: This pump held up and worked great for me while I exclusively pumped (around 6x/day) for three months for my daughter. The parts are easy to clean, and you can't beat the price when you compare it to the popular double electric pumps out there. I have not tried any other pumps, so I'm only giving it 4 stars since I have nothing to compare it to and maybe I'm missing out on some some magical experience with a Medela, but I see absolutely no reason to spend more and would recommend this to any pumping mom.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than my previous Medela
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure this would be as good as my previous pump which was a Medela but I actually like it better. Much easier to disassemble and clean and does not lack on power either. Great buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer alegria

customer_reviews.title: Great pump for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pump for six months now, usually 2-3 times a day, and it still works just as well now as it did the first time I used it. It doesn't come with a carrying case or bag of any kind, but I found that my pump and all the parts fit very nicely in a large rectangular zip-up makeup bag. It is quiet, compact, and super-easy to use. I have found that Playtex bottles will fit the shield part if you pump more than 4 or 5 ounces from a side at one sitting, and I'm sure there are other bottles that would fit, too. Overall, a very good purchase and would recommend highly to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying unless you only need it for a month
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for about a month and then the plug-in in the machine broke off so I was unable to plug it into the wall had to continue buying batteries which got expensive I do not recommend buying this unless you only want to pump for a month
customer_reviews.author: Christy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love this pump
customer_reviews.text: Love this pump. It's affordable and it works really well. I've been using it for 2 months now and it hasn't lost suction. I like that it's a closed system so there's no chance of the milk getting in the motor or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very mediocre product - low pressure
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to buy the Medela but we bought this unit thinking it was the same, but it is not at all. It doesn't have enough pressure to milk both breasts, neither does a good job in one. If you have the chance to buy the other brand, don't hesistate to do it. It is a really expensive product for what I does. Unfortunately we are not in the USA otherwise we would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: hastorquiza

customer_reviews.title: Works great especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great especially for the price! I used a medela for my first child and paid almost double the price for a single pump! Ridiculous! Wish I had come across this pump sooner. Haven't had a problem with it and works better than medela in my opinion. Love the bottles too my newborn took right to them with no nipple confusion. Love this product! Will definitely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Cottingham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome electric pump
customer_reviews.text: Love this double electric pump. It can be easily converted to single. It was easy to assemble and clean. It was also easy to use. I pumped for 15min the first time and it was so effortless and hardly uncomfortable. I love lansinoh products.
customer_reviews.author: Cola

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money, you’ll need a new pump soon.
customer_reviews.text: I used this pump a few times a week twice a day and it gave out in within two months. Finding parts for this is also difficult- They only make one other size flange so hopefully you have “standard” size nipples. For very rare use it would be ok but there’s still much better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah B

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: After giving birth to my second child she had a very hard time breast feeding. since I wanted to give her the best and provide breast milk I knew I would need a pump if she continued having a hard time. This one was a little more than i wanted to pay but has been very worth it. I can pump what I need in a manner of minutes, its pain free and very easy to take a part to wash. The only con I found was that i needed to find adapter rings for my Avent bottles because the pump did not fit them but they were found here on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Crzymomma

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a portable. Instructions were clear. I did not actually use this device, however.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: The pump works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: On the first day I couldn't pump anything but that was because I didn't have alot of milk. On the second day I had alot of milk so pumping was very easy and fast. The pump works great but know that it isnt going to magically pump out milk when you don't have some.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Amoa

customer_reviews.title: Suction problems
customer_reviews.text: It has been 6 months, I use this pump 4 times every two weeks when my baby goes and has a sleep over with his aunt. The suction sucks on it now even though I barely used it. ( I never put in the batteries, anytime I use it I keep it in an outlet) A manual pump is definitely a better option then this pump. 😪
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke Within One Month Of Use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve literally had it for one month the be exact and it broke. It will not power on at all; I should’ve known when the battery operated function didn’t work but I didn’t mind because I’m on maternity leave and don’t go far. I need a refund
customer_reviews.author: Caerra

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective
customer_reviews.text: This breast pump was recommended to me by my lactation consultant.. and truly it is a great breast pump and costs way less than the Medela. It comes with an instructional DVD and my favorite thing about this breast pump is that it has only a few parts, so it's very simple to use and maintenance is easy, it is light weight and it can operate on both batteries and outlet. If you buy Lansinoh nursing pads it comes with 2 samples of breastmilk storage bags and I've been collecting them, so there would be no need to go out and buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This pump works great! It does exactly what I need it to do. I have zero complaints. I 100% recommend. The price really can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the milk out
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product...only real disappointment is that it uses 6x AA batteries instead of lithium rechargeable cells. I feel like there was a great opportunity that was missed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cornella

customer_reviews.title: First time mom
customer_reviews.text: As a new mom I didn't know what to Use as my 1st pump. I have the manual one And the electric and I have no regrets. The suction is good it's easy to carry around not heavy very portable . It's not extremely loud but Definitely makes sound when in use. Definitely keeping this around.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and painless
customer_reviews.text: My sister just had her 3rd baby and was hesitant to pump because of how painful it was during her first 2 children’s infancy. She gave me the ok to try this one out and is very glad to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great pump. Works great for me. Suction is strong & gets the job done within 10 minutes. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok. This product worked for a little while and then lost suction. Replaced with a new one and so far so goid
customer_reviews.author: HollyShannon

customer_reviews.title: Works well after initial pump unit replaced
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave this 4 stars based on the performance of a 2nd unit we were shipped after the first unit (older model) was defective. Customer service from Lansinoh was excellent; very rapidly sent a new unit and without any trouble -- very important when you are highly emotional and lactating. Its not the quietest pump (I know because I fall asleep and wake up to its sound everyday), but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: D. Salotti

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Love my pump, different settings for max milk pull, all I need is a small bag to bring it anywhere I want, easy to put together, easy to clean, overall great.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: So much better than medela pump
customer_reviews.text: Love it better than the medela. For having issues with bleeding and cracking with the medela this is for sure the perfect because I’ve used it a lot and haven’t had any bleeding or cracking. I also use all their other products to let’s make this match too :)
customer_reviews.author: Kieda

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t have made a better purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Used Medela pumps before and for the price that I paid for this I thought it wasn’t going to work as well, but I was surprised to how it works! The only problem is the valve that easily rips but I replaced it for duckbill valve and it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Good price and work great for storage of breastmilk
customer_reviews.text: Good price and work great for storage of breastmilk. They freeze super flat. Only have occasional leaks from the bags when I defrost them, but I always defrost in a Tupperware just in case so that it doesn't leak all over the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Anan Abu Yousef

customer_reviews.title: I really love this pump
customer_reviews.text: I really love this pump. Second time mom needing a good pump without having to spend a lot of money. The different settings help as I am exclusively pumping. I used this brand’s bags for my first pregnancy and they are the best and fit perfectly with this pump. The bottles work so well with a slow flow which is perfect for my baby. I would definitely recommend this for its price and getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: It wont last that long
customer_reviews.text: Loved the machine, besided the fact that it did not last more then 7 months, not sure if i will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Torres

customer_reviews.title: I love this pump!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, almost more than my spectra!. It's so nice that it is battery operated and small and easy to transport. Also it is easy to take apart and clean.
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than my medela!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pump is amazing! Way better suction than my medela, and small enough to fit into my diaper bag-instead of having to carry another bag along!
customer_reviews.author: MamaS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with my second child, the first was 10 years ago..! I remember using the giant Egnell pumps at the hospital and i had also borrowed one from my local LLL. This Lansinoh pump works very well for me, and seems to be just as efficient as those monster size, 30 # pumps! I like how it has both speed *and* suction control. You can't call it silent, but it is acceptably quiet, i don't find it bothersome. It is a very compact pump, it is lightweight and the parts clean easily with care. This was money well spent for me.
customer_reviews.author: icebear

customer_reviews.title: Does not pump well
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. Does not pump milk out. I hate I wasted my money now i have to buy another pump. The tubing was bent and it does not allow proper pumping. I replaced the tubing and it still does not empty my breast. I am a full time pumping mother since i work 10 hours out the day and i am not happy that it won't do what i need done. The only thing i loved was it arrived a day early.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn

customer_reviews.title: Great pump overall
customer_reviews.text: I am using this pump for light duty (I am a SAHM, so I do not pump as much as a working mother). I have found that this pump served my needs adequately. It is easy to use and is simple to clean (most but not all parts can go in the dishwasher). The only reason I wouldn't give this pump a 5-star rating is that the lettering on the bottles is washing off, making it difficult to determine how much milk I have pumped. I honestly wish the markings were molded plastic instead. For the record, Ameda parts can be used to replace parts for this pump.
customer_reviews.author: JH&RG

product_meta.title: Lansinoh Signature Pro Double Electric Portable Breast Pump with Pumping Essentials and Tote Bag
product_meta.description: The Lansinoh SignaturePro provides advanced technology at an affordable price. This pump is the ONLY pump with three pumping styles and eight adjustable suction levels, allowing you to select the setting that works best for you. The closed-system design reduces the number of parts cleaned and prevents bacteria and mold growth. Compact size and quiet motor make it convenient for the mom on-the-go. Package Includes: Lansinoh SignaturePro Double Electric Breast Pump base unit 2 5 ounce Lansinoh mOmma Bottles Lansinoh mOmmaNaturalWave Nipple and cap 2 Breastmilk Storage Bags 2 Disposable Nursing Pads Lansinoh HPA Lanolin sample 2 Breast Flange Bodies 2 Collars, diaphragms, and sealing discs 2 ComfortFit flanges (25mm) 2 White valves (2 extra) 2 Bottle Stands 3 Connection tubes Tubing strap Y Tubing connector Pump connector AC Adaptor Tote Bag Pump manual with everything you need to know to get started.
feature_bullets: Versatile & efficient: This double electric breast pump is the ultimate in comfort, with 3 pumping styles & 8 suction levels to match baby's feeding patterns & maximize comfort & milk production.
Flexible & hygienic: A hygienic closed system design keeps breastmilk from backing up into the motor or tubing to help prevent mold & bacteria. It can be used as a double or single electric pump.

Convenient & hygienic: Lansinoh breast pumps allow you to pump directly into our pre-sterilized Lansinoh breastmilk storage bags for convenient, hygienic pumping that saves precious breastmilk & time.
By & for moms: Founded by a breastfeeding mom, Lansinoh is committed to helping moms succeed in breastfeeding with breast pumps, nursing pads, nipple cream, breast milk storage bags & more.

Mom founded & parent led: Founded by a breastfeeding mom, Lansinoh has supported moms for 35 years with award winning breast pumps, nipple creams, nursing pads, and breast milk storage bags, helping families create bonds that last a lifetime.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
